as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

autoSaveId.description: Unique id used to auto-save group arrangement via `localStorage`.
autoSaveId.description_zh: 用于通过`localStorage`自动保存组排列的唯一ID.

keyboardResizeBy.description: Step size when arrow key was pressed.

storage.description: Custom storage API; defaults to localStorage.

events.name: layout
events.description: Event handler called when group layout changes
events.description_zh: 组布局更改时调用的事件处理程序
